columns.docname: CASE "RELATING TO CERTAIN ASPECTS OF THE LAWS ON THE USE OF LANGUAGES IN EDUCATION IN BELGIUM" (MERITS)
columns.conclusion: Violation of Art. 14+P1-2;No violation of Art. 8;Just satisfaction reserved
